entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as the best friend of two people who seemed unlikely to speak to each other again. He has scratches and cuts on his hands and forearms from Hermione's bird attack.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as the one who attacked Ron with her bird, causing him physical harm.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to remain friends with both Ron and Hermione, but spending a lot of time with his mouth shut tight due to the tension between them.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned as someone Hermione snogged.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as the host of a Christmas party that Ron was planning to attend with Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron suffered physical harm from Hermione's bird attack.
Harry is trying to remain friends with Ron, despite the tension between them.
Ron was planning to attend Slughorn's Christmas party with Hermione.
